name: freeboard-widget-react
description: A starter template for building freeboard widgets using react.

scripts.prebuild: echo return > temp #add a return for freeboard
scripts.build: jsx code.jsx >> temp #transform jsx to js
scripts.postbuild:
cat temp | tr '
' ' ' > code.js && rm temp #replace newlines with spaces
scripts.dashboard: cat ../freeboard/dashboard.json | freeboard-react-buildtool > temp && cp temp ../freeboard/dashboard.json && rm temp
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run dashboard
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec npm run dev --watch code.jsx --watch data.js

author: jritsema
